argument.name: radians
argument.description: A number between - p and + p.

page.description: Returns the arc cosine of an angle expressed in radians.
page.discussion: ACOS() returns the arc cosine of a radian angle. The radian angle must be expressed in radians. For angles measured in degrees, use acos( dtor(degree_angle) ).
page.example: dim pi as N dim angle as N pi = 3.14159 angle = 45 acos(0) -> 1.57 acos(1) -> 0 acos(-1) -> 3.14 acos(pi) -> 0 acos( dtor(angle) ) -> 0.667457
